display_name: MSLT: Medications (over the counter or prescription) Taken Today
description:
Clinical MSLT only. List of drugs taken available

Variable from a Multiple Sleep Latency Test (MSLT), [Roehrs & Roth 1992 (PubMed ID: 1552009)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/1552009/).

[Search for all Multiple Sleep Latency TestVariables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/wsc/variables?search=mslt)
